rooms.description: Spacious living area integrated with dining space for entertainment.
Efficient kitchen layout optimized for functionality and safety per local norms.
Two-car garage accommodating vehicles with provisions for storage space.

Balcony access leading to living area, ensuring natural light.

rooms.description: Master bedroom with spacious balcony offering privacy and serene view.

Fourth bedroom optimized for functionality and minimalism.

Private gym integrated with the residence for fitness and wellness.
